headline: Ascendion Joins ServiceNow (NOW) to Accelerate AI-Driven Business Transformation
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the 11 must-buy AI stocks analysts are betting on. On June 16, the company received a significant boost after Ascendion, a leading force in artificial intelligence-driven software, joined its Consulting and Implementation Partner Program. Ascendion plans to help businesses move beyond basic artificial intelligence integration by joining ServiceNow Consulting […]
